Entry.JapaneseText: すごいね、クレアさん。 大勢の前であんな事をスラスラ話せてさ。
Entry.EnglishText: That was amazing, Claire! You spoke so eloquently about such a thing in front of all those people.

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん……思った事を夢中で話してただけ。 すごくなんてないわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Not really... I just got carried away saying what was on my mind. It wasn't amazing at all.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、スゴイよ！ ボクにはできそうにないもん。
Entry.EnglishText: No, it sure was! I wouldn't be able to do something like that.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうね、あんたはよけいな事ばっかり しゃべってるものね。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, whenever you talk, nobody wants to hear it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>なんて、ボクにイジワルなコト ばっかり言ってさ……フンだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, whenever you talk to me, you're mean! Hmph!
